author: mmusich
body:
#### PR description:

This is a follow-up to https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/45776 and adds a variant to the phase-2 HLT timing menu worklow using the `alpaka` modifier. This should help in spotting issues such as https://github.com/cms-sw/cmssw/pull/46060.

#### PR validation:

```console
$ runTheMatrix.py --what upgrade -nel 29634.751

[...]

29634.751 TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_2026D110_GenSimHLBeamSpot14+DigiTrigger_HLT75e33TimingAlpaka_2026D110 [1]: cmsDriver.py TTbar_14TeV_TuneCP5_cfi  -s GEN,SIM -n 10 --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T33 --beamspot DBrealisticHLLHC --datatier GEN-SIM --eventcontent FEVTDEBUG --geometry Extended2026D110 --era Phase2C17I13M9 --relval 9000,100 
                                           [2]: cmsDriver.py step2  -s DIGI:pdigi_valid,L1TrackTrigger,L1,L1P2GT,DIGI2RAW,HLT:75e33_timing --conditions auto:phase2_realistic_T33 --datatier GEN-SIM-DIGI-RAW -n 10 --eventcontent FEVTDEBUGHLT --geometry Extended2026D110 --era Phase2C17I13M9 --procModifiers alpaka

1 workflows with 2 steps
```

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

N/A
title: add a phase-2 relval workflow running the HLT timing menu with alpaka modifier, up to step2
